participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Sensitive and creative, often seeking ways to express her feelings.
participant_1.background: I wear a dress that makes me feel beautiful and go for a walk in the park. I had to learn how to cook without shrimp because of my shellfish allergy. I'm feeling pretty down after my wife left me. My dream is to be a veterinarian.

participant_2.name: Jake
participant_2.personality: Supportive and practical, always looking for ways to help others.
participant_2.background: I have fond memories of playing basketball with my friends in the park. I am fairly conservative in politics. My father is a mechanic. My car is over 20 years old. I work at McDonald's.

content.text: Hey I'm 25 and my wife just left me. I'm feeling pretty down. Any advice?
I'm sorry to hear that. I'm 27 and just got a divorce. It's tough but you'll get through it.
Thanks. I'm not sure what to do. I'm feeling lost.
I know what you mean. I felt the same way. But you have to keep going.
I know. I just don't know where to start.
Well what do you like to do?
I like to cook. I'm a pretty good cook.
That's a great skill to have. Maybe you could start your own cooking show.
That's a great idea! I'll start working on that.
That's great! I'm sure you'll be a success.
Thanks for the support. I really appreciate it.
No problem. I'm always here for you.
